text: Marriage is another trap. If you are someone who likes independence, it's another stamp against that. And you have to swear to fidelity.
author: Carla Bruni

text: A good businessman never makes a contract unless he's sure he can carry it through, yet every fool on earth is perfectly willing to sign a marriage contract without considering whether he can live up to it or not.
author: Dalton Trumbo

text: It is sad that the Republican leadership is not as interested as they say they are in protecting the institution of marriage as they are in waging a campaign to divide and distract the American people from the real issues that need to be addressed.
author: Kendrick Meek

text: A band is not a marriage. There are no oaths of allegiance. If you feel your life will be better served by splitting up the group, you've got to do it - but of course it does cause problems.
author: Steve Winwood

text: I've never really been very good at marriage. It's one of my failures. I've tried my best, but I do realise the common denominator is me it's something I'm doing.
author: Len Goodman
